author: Simon Difford
description: Sip through orange and coffee liqueur to a gin-laced orange cola drink.
name: Attitude Adjuster
recipeIngredient: 75 ml Cola (e.g. Coca Cola or Pepsi Cola)
5 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
TOP with cola then DRIZZLE orange and coffee liqueurs
